subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Under the steady guidance of John Calipari disciple Derek Kellogg, a long-lost buzz has returned to the Massachusetts men’s basketball program that has cracked the top 25 and kept climbing.
snippet: Under the steady guidance of John Calipari disciple Derek Kellogg, a long-lost buzz has returned to the Massachusetts men’s basketball program that has cracked the top 25 and kept climbing.
